task.en: Help me enlarge the list size, but don't apply the changes.
task.zh: 帮我放大列表尺寸，但不应用更改。
task.ar: ساعدني في تكبير حجم القائمة، لكن لا تطبق التغييرات.
task.ja: リストサイズを拡大してください。ただし変更は適用しないでください。
task.ru: Увеличьте размер списка, но не применяйте изменения.

grading_command: osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to tell process "Music" to get value of pop up button 1 of group 1 of window "General"' 2>/dev/null | grep -q "Large" && echo "True" || echo "False"
osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to tell process "Music" to get value of pop up button 1 of group 1 of window "通用"' 2>/dev/null | grep -q "大" && echo "True" || echo "False"
osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to tell process "Music" to get value of pop up button 1 of group 1 of window "عام"' 2>/dev/null | grep -q "كبير" && echo "True" || echo "False"
osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to tell process "Music" to get value of pop up button 1 of group 1 of window "一般"' 2>/dev/null | grep -q "大" && echo "True" || echo "False"
osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to tell process "Music" to get value of pop up button 1 of group 1 of window "Основные"' 2>/dev/null | grep -q "Большой" && echo "True" || echo "False"
